attributes.action: PLEASE HELP BAN ANIMAL CRUELTY 4 GOOD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is about:

Banning cruelty to animals 2day and 4 good.
Over 100 dogs and cats suffer from or even die from some kind of cruelty.
Over 200 whales and dolphins get slaughtered for money.
West Yorkshire is the most worst area in Britain for animal cruelty.
Japan is the most popular country for whales and dolphins hunting.
Alaska is the most popular for wolves hunting.

So if you could  take one minute of your time to sign my petition we have 99:99% chance of banning ANIMAL CRUELTY 2DAY & 4 GOOD!

Thanks

Elizabeth

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
